required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real World Study in Locally Advanced or Metastatic NSCLC Patients, Progressed From First-line EGFR-TKI Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Real World Molecular Testing, Treatment Patterns, and Clinical Outcomes in EGFR Mutation-Positive, Locally Advanced or Metastatic Chinese NSCLC Patients, Who Have Progressed From First-line EGFR-TKI Therapy (PISCES)

brief_summary.textblock: To estimate parameters associated with treatment patterns and related clinical outcomes.Including physician reported PFS and OS

detailed_description.textblock: The objectives of this study are to assess molecular testing, treatment patterns, and associated clinical outcomes among patients with epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) mutation-positive locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have progressed from first-line EGFR-TKI (tyrosine kinase inhibitor) therapy. This study is descriptive in nature and does not attempt to test any specific a priori hypotheses.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: from date of second-line treatment initiation until progression by RECIST1.1 criteria, or death

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: the date of second-line treatment initiation until death from any cause(only for patients receiving 2L CT and 2L TKI, separately)

primary_outcome.measure: Time to initiate second line therapy from progression from 1L treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: Time to initiate second line therapy from RECIST1.1 defined progression from 1L treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: Response rate reported by physician or judged by Recist1.1 after receiving any pattern of therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: For each line of chemotherapy received but not limited in:Therapy regimen，Therapy duration measured as time from therapy start date to time of therapy end date，Number of cycles received，Reason for cessation of therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: For each line of immunotherapy received but not limited in:Therapy regimen，Therapy duration measured as time from therapy start date to time of therapy end date，Number of cycles received，Reason for cessation of therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: For each line of targeted therapy received but not limited in:Therapy regimen，Therapy duration measured as time from therapy start date to time of therapy end date，Number of cycles received，Reason for cessation of therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: For each line of local therapy received but not limited in:Therapy regimen，Therapy duration measured as time from therapy start date to time of therapy end date，Number of cycles received，Reason for cessation of therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular testing sample type

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular test outcome

secondary_outcome.measure: changes in testing rate over time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters associated with molecular testing patterns, including changes in testing rate over time

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Molecular testing rate defined as the number of patients identified as having received molecular testing divided by the number of patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from progression date to molecular testing
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Time from the RECIST defined progression date to molecular testing

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular testing method of biopsy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular testing turnaround time

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular test type

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including reason for molecular testing

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular testing laboratory type

secondary_outcome.measure: reason for not performing a molecular test
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns including reason for not performing a molecular test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns including molecular testing result of mutation status

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including molecular result of mutation type

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To estimate parameters in the target population associated with molecular testing patterns, including histologic/phenotypic transformation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Overall CNS metastases rate, defined as the number of patients developing CNS metastases divided by the number of evaluable patients (From start of 2L therapy)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Brain metastases rate, defined as the number of patients developing brain metastases divided by the number of evaluable patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Leptomeningeal metastases rate, defined as the number of patients developing leptomeningeal metastases divided by the number of evaluable patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of treatments for CNS metastases
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Treatments for CNS metastases, including type of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Date of treatments for CNS metastases
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Treatments for CNS metastases, including dates of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in score from baseline for each QoL domain measured at each subsequent site visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To assess patient-reported HRQoL using European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Core 30 items (EORTC QLQ-C30) and European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Lung Cancer 13 items (EORTC QLQ-LC13)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in score from baseline for overall QoL measured at each subsequent site visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrolment to follow-up of up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To assess patient-reported HRQoL using European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Core 30 items (EORTC QLQ-C30) and European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire - Lung Cancer 13 items (EORTC QLQ-LC13)

arm_group.description: Patients with confirmed EGFR mutation-positive, locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC, who have progressed from first line EGFR-TKI therapy who will receive different treatment

study_pop.textblock: Adult male or female patients (with age ≥18 years old) who have given provision of signed and dated written informed consent by the patient or legally acceptable Patients with confirmed EGFR mutation-positive, locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC, who have progressed from first line EGFR-TKI therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria
1. Male or female patients with age ≥18 years old
2. Histologically or cytologically confirmed locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC patients
3. Patients with prior confirmed EGFR mutation-positive, who have progressed from first line EGFR-TKI*
4. Provision of written informed consent by the patient should be within 6 weeks of the date of progression from first line EGFR-TKI treatment *Note：
1. First-line EGFR-TKI is monotherapy;
2. EGFR-TKI has been launched in China includes first-generation, second-generation or third-generation EGFR-TKI, but not including the original chemical compound
3. Exclude the Chinese traditional medicine that is being used to treat lung cancer
4. Progression was determined according to Recist1.1 criteria.
Exclusion Criteria
1. Involvement in the planning and/or conduct of the other intervention study
2. Previous enrolment in the present study
3. Pregnancy or breast-feeding
